blocks.name: pjhmopi
blocks.content: A projector is a Hermitian operator. (Contributed by NM, 24-Mar-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pjhmopi(class c0) {
  |- wcel(cfv(cpjh, c0), cho)
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(cfv(cpjh, c0), cho), wf(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba, chba), wral(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(cv(hs0), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(hs0)), csp, cv(hs1))))))
  pjfi(c0)
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, chba, wceq(co(cv(hs0), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(hs0)), csp, cv(hs1))))
  eqcomd(co(cv(hs0), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(hs0)), csp, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba)))
  pjadji(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0)
  elhmop(hs0, hs1, cfv(cpjh, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cpjh, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cpjh, c0))
}

thm pjhmopi(class c0) {
  ⊢ (projh ` c0)∈ HrmOp
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
} = {
  mpbir2an((projh ` c0)∈ HrmOp, ((projh ` c0): ~H → ~H), ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H, ∀(hs1 ∈ ~H,(hs0[.ih]((projh ` c0)` hs1))=(((projh ` c0)` hs0)[.ih]hs1))))
  pjfi(c0)
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, chba, (hs0[.ih]((projh ` c0)` hs1))=(((projh ` c0)` hs0)[.ih]hs1))
  eqcomd((hs0[.ih]((projh ` c0)` hs1)), (((projh ` c0)` hs0)[.ih]hs1), (hs0 ∈ ~H ∧ hs1 ∈ ~H))
  pjadji(hs0, hs1, c0)
  elhmop(hs0, hs1, (projh ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((projh ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((projh ` c0))
}

blocks.name: pjlnopi
blocks.content: A projector is a linear operator. (Contributed by NM, 24-Mar-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: pjnmopi

blocks.name: hmopidmpji
blocks.content: An idempotent Hermitian operator is a projection operator. Theorem 26.4 of [Halmos] p. 44. (Halmos seems to omit the proof that ` H ` is a closed subspace, which is not trivial as ~ hmopidmchi shows.) (Contributed by NM, 22-Apr-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  rgen(hs0, chba, (((projh ` c0)∘(c1[+op]c2))` hs0)=((((projh ` c0)∘ c1)[+op]((projh ` c0)∘ c2))` hs0))
  3eqtr4d((((projh ` c0)∘(c1[+op]c2))` hs0), ((((projh ` c0)∘ c1)[+op]((projh ` c0)∘ c2))` hs0), ((projh ` c0)`((c1[+op]c2)` hs0)), ((((projh ` c0)∘ c1)` hs0)[+h](((projh ` c0)∘ c2)` hs0)), hs0 ∈ ~H)
  3eqtr4d(((projh ` c0)`((c1[+op]c2)` hs0)), ((((projh ` c0)∘ c1)` hs0)[+h](((projh ` c0)∘ c2)` hs0)), ((projh ` c0)`((c1 ` hs0)[+h](c2 ` hs0))), (((projh ` c0)`(c1 ` hs0))[+h]((projh ` c0)`(c2 ` hs0))), hs0 ∈ ~H)
  syl2anc(hs0 ∈ ~H, ((projh ` c0)`((c1 ` hs0)[+h](c2 ` hs0)))=(((projh ` c0)`(c1 ` hs0))[+h]((projh ` c0)`(c2 ` hs0))), (c1 ` hs0)∈ ~H, (c2 ` hs0)∈ ~H)
  ffvelrni(hs0, chba, c1, chba)

  mp3an12(hs0 ∈ ~H, ((c1[+op]c2)` hs0)=((c1 ` hs0)[+h](c2 ` hs0)), (c1 : ~H → ~H), (c2 : ~H → ~H))
  hosval(c1, c2, hs0)
  oveq12d((((projh ` c0)∘ c1)` hs0), cva, (((projh ` c0)∘ c2)` hs0), ((projh ` c0)`(c1 ` hs0)), ((projh ` c0)`(c2 ` hs0)), hs0 ∈ ~H)
  hocoi(hs0, (projh ` c0), c1)
  hocoi(hs0, (projh ` c0), c2)
  hocoi(hs0, (projh ` c0), (c1[+op]c2))
  mp3an12(hs0 ∈ ~H, ((((projh ` c0)∘ c1)[+op]((projh ` c0)∘ c2))` hs0)=((((projh ` c0)∘ c1)` hs0)[+h](((projh ` c0)∘ c2)` hs0)), (((projh ` c0)∘ c1): ~H → ~H), (((projh ` c0)∘ c2): ~H → ~H))
  hosval(((projh ` c0)∘ c1), ((projh ` c0)∘ c2), hs0)
  hoeqi(hs0, ((projh ` c0)∘(c1[+op]c2)), (((projh ` c0)∘ c1)[+op]((projh ` c0)∘ c2)))
  hocofi((projh ` c0), (c1[+op]c2))

  mp3an12(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wceq(cfv(co(c1, chod, c2), cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmv, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wf(c1, chba, chba), wf(c2, chba, chba))

blocks.name: pjsdi2i
blocks.content: Chained distributive law for Hilbert space operator difference. (Contributed by NM, 30-Nov-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pjsdi2i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wceq(ccom(c0, co(c1, chos, c2)), co(ccom(c0, c1), chos, ccom(c0, c2))), wceq(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), c0), co(c1, chos, c2)), co(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), c0), c1), chos, ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), c0), c2))))
  -| wcel(c3, cch)
  -| wf(c0, chba, chba)
  -| wf(c1, chba, chba)
  -| wf(c2, chba, chba)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), c0), co(c1, chos, c2)), co(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), c0), c1), chos, ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), c0), c2)), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), ccom(c0, co(c1, chos, c2))), co(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), ccom(c0, c1)), chos, ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), ccom(c0, c2))), wceq(ccom(c0, co(c1, chos, c2)), co(ccom(c0, c1), chos, ccom(c0, c2))))
  syl6eq(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), ccom(c0, co(c1, chos, c2))), co(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), ccom(c0, c1)), chos, ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), ccom(c0, c2))), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), co(ccom(c0, c1), chos, ccom(c0, c2))), wceq(ccom(c0, co(c1, chos, c2)), co(ccom(c0, c1), chos, ccom(c0, c2))))
  coeq2(ccom(c0, co(c1, chos, c2)), co(ccom(c0, c1), chos, ccom(c0, c2)), cfv(cpjh, c3))
  pjsdii(c3, ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c0, c2))
  hocofi(c0, c1)
  hocofi(c0, c2)
  coass(cfv(cpjh, c3), c0, co(c1, chos, c2))
  oveq12i(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), c0), c1), chos, ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), c0), c2), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), ccom(c0, c1)), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), ccom(c0, c2)))
  coass(cfv(cpjh, c3), c0, c1)
  coass(cfv(cpjh, c3), c0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pjsdi2i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∘(c1[+op]c2))=((c0 ∘ c1)[+op](c0 ∘ c2))→(((projh ` c3)∘ c0)∘(c1[+op]c2))=((((projh ` c3)∘ c0)∘ c1)[+op](((projh ` c3)∘ c0)∘ c2)))
  ⊣ c3 ∈ CH
  ⊣ (c0 : ~H → ~H)
  ⊣ (c1 : ~H → ~H)
  ⊣ (c2 : ~H → ~H)
} = {
  3eqtr4g((((projh ` c3)∘ c0)∘(c1[+op]c2)), ((((projh ` c3)∘ c0)∘ c1)[+op](((projh ` c3)∘ c0)∘ c2)), ((projh ` c3)∘(c0 ∘(c1[+op]c2))), (((projh ` c3)∘(c0 ∘ c1))[+op]((projh ` c3)∘(c0 ∘ c2))), (c0 ∘(c1[+op]c2))=((c0 ∘ c1)[+op](c0 ∘ c2)))
  syl6eq(((projh ` c3)∘(c0 ∘(c1[+op]c2))), (((projh ` c3)∘(c0 ∘ c1))[+op]((projh ` c3)∘(c0 ∘ c2))), ((projh ` c3)∘((c0 ∘ c1)[+op](c0 ∘ c2))), (c0 ∘(c1[+op]c2))=((c0 ∘ c1)[+op](c0 ∘ c2)))
  coeq2((c0 ∘(c1[+op]c2)), ((c0 ∘ c1)[+op](c0 ∘ c2)), (projh ` c3))
  pjsdii(c3, (c0 ∘ c1), (c0 ∘ c2))
  hocofi(c0, c1)
  hocofi(c0, c2)
  coass((projh ` c3), c0, (c1[+op]c2))
  oveq12i((((projh ` c3)∘ c0)∘ c1), chos, (((projh ` c3)∘ c0)∘ c2), ((projh ` c3)∘(c0 ∘ c1)), ((projh ` c3)∘(c0 ∘ c2)))
  coass((projh ` c3), c0, c1)
  coass((projh ` c3), c0, c2)
}

blocks.content: Adjoint of composition of projections. Special case of Theorem 3.11(viii) of [Beran] p. 106. (Contributed by NM, 6-Oct-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm pjadjcoi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(co(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0), csp, c1), co(c0, csp, cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c1))))
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| wcel(c3, cch)
} = {

  sylancr(wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), chba)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(hs0))), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(hs0))), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))
  sylan2(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(hs0)), c0))

thm pjss1coi(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 ↔((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))=(projh ` c0))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
} = {
  impbii(c0 ⊆ c1, ((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))=(projh ` c0))

  ralrimiva(hs0, chba, c0 ⊆ c1, (((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))` hs0)=((projh ` c0)` hs0))
  eqtrd((((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))` hs0), ((projh ` c0)` hs0), ((projh ` c1)`((projh ` c0)` hs0)), (c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ ~H))
  adantl(c0 ⊆ c1, hs0 ∈ ~H, (((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))` hs0)=((projh ` c1)`((projh ` c0)` hs0)))
  pjcoi(hs0, c1, c0)
  sylancr((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ ~H), ((projh ` c1)`((projh ` c0)` hs0))=((projh ` c0)` hs0), c1 ∈ CH, ((projh ` c0)` hs0)∈ c1)
  sylan2(c0 ⊆ c1, hs0 ∈ ~H, ((projh ` c0)` hs0)∈ c1, ((projh ` c0)` hs0)∈ c0)
  pjcli(hs0, c0)
  ssel2(c0, c1, ((projh ` c0)` hs0))
  pjid(c1, ((projh ` c0)` hs0))
  hoeqi(hs0, ((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)), (projh ` c0))
  hocofi((projh ` c1), (projh ` c0))
  pjfi(c1)
  pjfi(c0)
  3sstr3g(c0, c1, ran((projh ` c0)), ran((projh ` c1)), ((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))=(projh ` c0))
  syl6eqssr(ran((projh ` c0)), ran((projh ` c1)), ran(((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))), ((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))=(projh ` c0))
  rneq(((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)), (projh ` c0))
  rncoss((projh ` c1), (projh ` c0))
  pjrni(c0)
  pjrni(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ⊆ c1)
  diff.hs0.c(((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)))
  diff.hs0.c((projh ` c0))
}

thm pjorthcoi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wceq(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), ch0o))

  ralrimiva(hs0, chba, wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wceq(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cv(hs0)), cfv(ch0o, cv(hs0))))
  3eqtr4d(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cv(hs0)), cfv(ch0o, cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(hs0))), c0v, wa(wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), chba)))
  impcom(wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(hs0))), c0v))
  sylibd(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(hs0))), c0v), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cort, c0)))
  syl5com(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cort, c0)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(hs0)), c1))
  pjcli(cv(hs0), c1)
  sylbi(wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wi(wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cort, c0))), wss(c1, cfv(cort, c0)))
  chsscon2i(c0, c1)
  ssel(c1, cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(hs0)))
  sylancr(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wb(wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cort, c0)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(hs0))), c0v)), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(hs0)), chba))
  pjhcli(cv(hs0), c1)
  pjoc2(c0, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(hs0)))
  adantl(wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wceq(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(hs0)))))
  pjcoi(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  adantl(wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wceq(cfv(ch0o, cv(hs0)), c0v))
  ho0val(cv(hs0))
  hoeqi(hs0, ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), ch0o)
  hocofi(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1))
  pjfi(c0)
  pjfi(c1)
  ho0f()
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)))

}

  mp3an12(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wi(wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, co(c0, chj, c1)), cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(hs0)), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  pjcjt2(c0, c1, cv(hs0))

  mp3an12(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wceq(cfv(co(cfv(cpjh, c0), chos, cfv(cpjh, c1)), cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cv(hs0)), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(hs0)))), wf(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba, chba), wf(cfv(cpjh, c1), chba, chba))

  normcl(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cv(s0)))

} = {

  breq2d(nat0, cle, ((((projh ` c0)[-op](projh ` c1))` s0)[.ih]s0), (((normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))[^]2)[-]((normh `((projh ` c1)` s0))[^]2)), s0 ∈ ~H)
  3eqtrd(((((projh ` c0)[-op](projh ` c1))` s0)[.ih]s0), (((normh `((projh ` c0)` s0))[^]2)[-]((normh `((projh ` c1)` s0))[^]2)), ((((projh ` c0)` s0)[-h]((projh ` c1)` s0))[.ih]s0), ((((projh ` c0)` s0)[.ih]s0)[-](((projh ` c1)` s0)[.ih]s0)), s0 ∈ ~H)
  oveq1d((((projh ` c0)[-op](projh ` c1))` s0), csp, s0, (((projh ` c0)` s0)[-h]((projh ` c1)` s0)), s0 ∈ ~H)

  pjfi(c0)

  id(s0 ∈ ~H)

blocks.name: pjordi
blocks.content: The definition of projector ordering in [Halmos] p. 42 is equivalent to the definition of projector ordering in [Beran] p. 110. (We will usually express projector ordering with the even simpler equivalent ` G C_ H ` ; see ~ pjssposi ). (Contributed by NM, 2-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pjordi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, chba, wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(cfv(cpjh, c0), chod, cfv(cpjh, c1)), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)))), wss(cima(cfv(cpjh, c1), chba), cima(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba)))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitr4i(wral(s0, chba, wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(cfv(cpjh, c0), chod, cfv(cpjh, c1)), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)))), wss(cima(cfv(cpjh, c1), chba), cima(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba)), wss(c1, c0))
  pjssposi(s0, c0, c1)
  sseq12i(cima(cfv(cpjh, c1), chba), cima(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba), c1, c0)
  ax-mp(wceq(cima(cfv(cpjh, c1), chba), c1), wfo(cfv(cpjh, c1), chba, c1))
  pjfoi(c1)
  foima(cfv(cpjh, c1), chba, c1)
  ax-mp(wceq(cima(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba), c0), wfo(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba, c0))
  pjfoi(c0)
  foima(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pjordi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤]((((projh ` c0)[-op](projh ` c1))` s0)[.ih]s0))↔((projh ` c1)" ~H)⊆((projh ` c0)" ~H))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitr4i(∀(s0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤]((((projh ` c0)[-op](projh ` c1))` s0)[.ih]s0)), ((projh ` c1)" ~H)⊆((projh ` c0)" ~H), c1 ⊆ c0)
  pjssposi(s0, c0, c1)
  sseq12i(((projh ` c1)" ~H), ((projh ` c0)" ~H), c1, c0)
  ax-mp(((projh ` c1)" ~H)= c1, ((projh ` c1): ~H ↠ c1))
  pjfoi(c1)
  foima((projh ` c1), chba, c1)
  ax-mp(((projh ` c0)" ~H)= c0, ((projh ` c0): ~H ↠ c0))
  pjfoi(c0)
  foima((projh ` c0), chba, c0)
}

  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 ↔((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0))∈ ran(projh))

  mp2an((projh `(c1 ⋂(_|_ ` c0)))∈ ran(projh), projh[Fn]CH, (c1 ⋂(_|_ ` c0))∈ CH)
  chincli(c1, (_|_ ` c0))
  choccli(c0)
  fnfvelrn(cpjh, cch, (c1 ⋂(_|_ ` c0)))
  eleq1(((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0)), (projh `(c1 ⋂(_|_ ` c0))), ran(projh))
  sylib(((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0))∈ ran(projh), ((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0))=(projh `(c1 ⋂(_|_ ` c0))), ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤]((((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0))` hs0)[.ih]hs0)))
  sylbi(((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0))∈ ran(projh), ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤]((((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0))` hs0)[.ih]hs0)), ∃(hs1 ∈ CH,(projh ` hs1)=((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0))))
  ax-mp((((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0))∈ ran(projh)↔ ∃(hs1 ∈ CH,(projh ` hs1)=((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0)))), projh[Fn]CH)
  pjmfn()
  fvelrnb(hs1, cpjh, cch, ((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0)))
  rexlimiva(hs1, cch, (projh ` hs1)=((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤]((((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0))` hs0)[.ih]hs0)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, chba, (hs1 ∈ CH ∧(projh ` hs1)=((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0))), 0[≤]((((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0))` hs0)[.ih]hs0))
  mpbid(((hs1 ∈ CH ∧(projh ` hs1)=((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0)))∧ hs0 ∈ ~H), 0[≤]((((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0))` hs0)[.ih]hs0), 0[≤](((projh ` hs1)` hs0)[.ih]hs0))
  adantlr(hs1 ∈ CH, (projh ` hs1)=((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0)), hs0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤](((projh ` hs1)` hs0)[.ih]hs0))
  pjige0(hs1, hs0)
  ad2antlr(hs1 ∈ CH, (projh ` hs1)=((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0)), hs0 ∈ ~H, (0[≤](((projh ` hs1)` hs0)[.ih]hs0)↔ 0[≤]((((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0))` hs0)[.ih]hs0)))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, (((projh ` hs1)` hs0)[.ih]hs0), ((((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0))` hs0)[.ih]hs0), (projh ` hs1)=((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0)))
  oveq1d(((projh ` hs1)` hs0), csp, hs0, (((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0))` hs0), (projh ` hs1)=((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0)))
  fveq1((projh ` hs1), ((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0)), hs0)
  bitri(∀(hs0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤]((((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0))` hs0)[.ih]hs0)), ((projh ` c1)[-op](projh ` c0))=(projh `(c1 ⋂(_|_ ` c0))), c0 ⊆ c1)
  pjssposi(hs0, c1, c0)

thm pjimai(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((projh ` c0)" c1)=((c1[+H](_|_ ` c0))⋂ c0)
  ⊣ c1 ∈ SH
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, ((projh ` c0)" c1), ((c1[+H](_|_ ` c0))⋂ c0))
  3bitr4i(hs0 ∈((projh ` c0)" c1), hs0 ∈((c1[+H](_|_ ` c0))⋂ c0), (hs0 ∈((projh ` c0)" c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (hs0 ∈(c1[+H](_|_ ` c0))∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  pm5.32ri(hs0 ∈((projh ` c0)" c1), hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(c1[+H](_|_ ` c0)))
  3bitr4g(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈((projh ` c0)" c1), hs0 ∈(c1[+H](_|_ ` c0)), ∃(hs1 ∈ c1,((projh ` c0)` hs1)= hs0), ∃(hs1 ∈ c1, ∃(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs0 =(hs1[-h]hs2))))
  rexbidva(hs1, c1, hs0 ∈ c0, ((projh ` c0)` hs1)= hs0, ∃(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs0 =(hs1[-h]hs2)))
  bitr4d((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1), ((projh ` c0)` hs1)= hs0, ∃(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs0 =(hs1[-h]hs2)), ∃(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs1 =(hs0[+h]hs2)))
  sylan9bbr(hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c1, ((projh ` c0)` hs1)= hs0, ∃(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs1 =(hs0[+h]hs2)), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∃(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs1 =(hs0[+h]hs2))))
  sylancr(hs1 ∈ c1, (((projh ` c0)` hs1)= hs0 ↔(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∃(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs1 =(hs0[+h]hs2)))), c0 ∈ CH, hs1 ∈ ~H)
  pjeq(hs2, c0, hs1, hs0)
  bicomd(hs0 ∈ c0, (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∃(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs1 =(hs0[+h]hs2))), ∃(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs1 =(hs0[+h]hs2)))
  ibar(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs1 =(hs0[+h]hs2)))
  rexbidva(hs2, (_|_ ` c0), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1), hs0 =(hs1[-h]hs2), hs1 =(hs0[+h]hs2))
  3expa(hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c1, hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), (hs0 =(hs1[-h]hs2)↔ hs1 =(hs0[+h]hs2)))
  3bitr4g((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0)), hs0 =(hs1[-h]hs2), hs1 =(hs0[+h]hs2), (hs1[-h]hs2)= hs0, (hs0[+h]hs2)= hs1)
  syl3an(hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c1, hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), ((hs1[-h]hs2)= hs0 ↔(hs0[+h]hs2)= hs1), hs0 ∈ ~H, hs1 ∈ ~H, hs2 ∈ ~H)
  cheli(hs0, c0)
  sheli(hs1, c1)
  cheli(hs2, (_|_ ` c0))
  bitr4d((hs0 ∈ ~H ∧ hs1 ∈ ~H ∧ hs2 ∈ ~H), (hs1[-h]hs2)= hs0, (hs0[+h]hs2)= hs1, (hs2[+h]hs0)= hs1)
  3comr(hs0 ∈ ~H, hs1 ∈ ~H, hs2 ∈ ~H, ((hs1[-h]hs2)= hs0 ↔(hs2[+h]hs0)= hs1))
  hvsubadd(hs1, hs2, hs0)
  eqeq1d((hs0[+h]hs2), hs1, (hs2[+h]hs0), (hs0 ∈ ~H ∧ hs1 ∈ ~H ∧ hs2 ∈ ~H))
  3adant2(hs0 ∈ ~H, hs1 ∈ ~H, hs2 ∈ ~H, (hs0[+h]hs2)=(hs2[+h]hs0))
  ax-hvcom(hs0, hs2)
  eqcom(hs0, (hs1[-h]hs2))
  eqcom(hs1, (hs0[+h]hs2))
  mp2an((hs0 ∈((projh ` c0)" c1)↔ ∃(hs1 ∈ c1,((projh ` c0)` hs1)= hs0)), (projh ` c0)[Fn]~H, c1 ⊆ ~H)
  pjfni(c0)
  shssii(c1)
  fvelimab(hs1, (projh ` c0), chba, c1, hs0)
  mp2an((hs0 ∈(c1[+H](_|_ ` c0))↔ ∃(hs1 ∈ c1, ∃(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs0 =(hs1[-h]hs2)))), c1 ∈ SH, (_|_ ` c0)∈ SH)
  chshii((_|_ ` c0))

  pm4.71i(hs0 ∈((projh ` c0)" c1), hs0 ∈ c0)

thm pjinvari(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∘ c1): ~H → c2)↔(c0 ∘ c1)=(c1 ∘(c0 ∘ c1)))
  ⊣ (c0 : ~H → ~H)
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 =(projh ` c2)
} = {
  impbii(((c0 ∘ c1): ~H → c2), (c0 ∘ c1)=(c1 ∘(c0 ∘ c1)))
  sylibr(((c0 ∘ c1): ~H → c2), (c0 ∘ c1)=(c1 ∘(c0 ∘ c1)), ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H,((c0 ∘ c1)` hs0)=((c1 ∘(c0 ∘ c1))` hs0)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, chba, ((c0 ∘ c1): ~H → c2), ((c0 ∘ c1)` hs0)=((c1 ∘(c0 ∘ c1))` hs0))
  eqtr4d(((c0 ∘ c1)` hs0), ((c1 ∘(c0 ∘ c1))` hs0), (c1 `((c0 ∘ c1)` hs0)), (((c0 ∘ c1): ~H → c2)∧ hs0 ∈ ~H))
  syl5req(((c0 ∘ c1)` hs0), (c1 `((c0 ∘ c1)` hs0)), ((projh ` c2)`((c0 ∘ c1)` hs0)), (((c0 ∘ c1): ~H → c2)∧ hs0 ∈ ~H))
  fveq1i(c1, ((c0 ∘ c1)` hs0), (projh ` c2))
  sylancr((((c0 ∘ c1): ~H → c2)∧ hs0 ∈ ~H), ((projh ` c2)`((c0 ∘ c1)` hs0))=((c0 ∘ c1)` hs0), c2 ∈ CH, ((c0 ∘ c1)` hs0)∈ c2)
  ffvelrn((c0 ∘ c1), chba, c2, hs0)
  pjid(c2, ((c0 ∘ c1)` hs0))
  fvco3((c0 ∘ c1), chba, c2, hs0, c1)
  mp2an(((c0 ∘ c1)=(c1 ∘(c0 ∘ c1))↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ ~H,((c0 ∘ c1)` hs0)=((c1 ∘(c0 ∘ c1))` hs0))), (c0 ∘ c1)[Fn]~H, (c1 ∘(c0 ∘ c1))[Fn]~H)
  hocofni(c0, c1)
  hocofni(c1, (c0 ∘ c1))
  eqfnfv(hs0, (c0 ∘ c1), chba, (c1 ∘(c0 ∘ c1)))
  mpbiri((c0 ∘ c1)=(c1 ∘(c0 ∘ c1)), ((c0 ∘ c1): ~H → c2), ((c1 ∘(c0 ∘ c1)): ~H → c2))
  mp2an(((c1 ∘(c0 ∘ c1)): ~H → c2), (c1 : ~H → c2), ((c0 ∘ c1): ~H → ~H))
  hocofi(c0, c1)
  mp2an((c1 : ~H → ~H), (c1 : ~H → c2), c2 ⊆ ~H)
  mpbir((c1 : ~H → c2), ((projh ` c2): ~H → c2))
  ax-mp(((projh ` c2): ~H → c2), ((projh ` c2): ~H ↠ c2))
  pjfoi(c2)
  fof((projh ` c2), chba, c2)
  feq1i(c1, chba, c2, (projh ` c2))
  chssii(c2)
  fss(c1, chba, c2, chba)
  fco(c1, chba, c2, (c0 ∘ c1), chba)
  feq1((c0 ∘ c1), (c1 ∘(c0 ∘ c1)), chba, c2)

  ⊢ (((projh ` c0)=((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∧(projh ` c1)=((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)))↔(projh ` c0)=(projh ` c1))

  pjss2coi(c0, c1)
  eqcom(((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1)), (projh ` c0))
  bitri(c1 ⊆ c0, (projh ` c1)=((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)), ((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))=(projh ` c1))
  pjss2coi(c1, c0)
  eqcom(((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)), (projh ` c1))
  fveq2(c0, c1, cpjh)
  jca((projh ` c0)=(projh ` c1), (projh ` c0)=((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1)), (projh ` c1)=((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)))

blocks.name: pjci
blocks.content: Two subspaces commute iff their projections commute. Lemma 4 of [Kalmbach] p. 67. (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm pjci(class c0, class c1) {

} = {

  3eqtr4g(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c1)))), co(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), chos, ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)))), co(cfv(cpjh, cin(c0, c1)), chos, cfv(cpjh, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c1)))), wceq(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c0))))
  oveq12d(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), chos, ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1))), cfv(cpjh, cin(c0, c1)), cfv(cpjh, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c1))), wceq(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c0))))
  pjclem4(c0, c1)

  pjclem3(c0, c1)
  pjclem4(c0, cfv(cort, c1))
  eqtr3i(cfv(cpjh, c0), co(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), chos, ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)))), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, chba)))
  eqtr3i(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, chba)), cfv(cpjh, c0), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), chio))
  coeq2i(cfv(cpjh, c0), chio, cfv(cpjh, chba))

  coeq2i(cfv(cpjh, c0), co(cfv(cpjh, c1), chos, cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1))), cfv(cpjh, chba))
  pjtoi(c1)

  pjfi(c1)

thm pjci(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[C_H]c1 ↔((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))=((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
} = {
  impbii(c0[C_H]c1, ((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))=((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)))
  pjclem2(c0, c1)
  sylibr(((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))=((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)), c0[C_H]c1, c0 =((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH](c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1))))
  sylib(((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))=((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)), c0 =((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH](c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1))), (projh ` c0)=(projh `((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH](c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1)))))
  3eqtr4g((projh ` c0), (projh `((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH](c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1)))), (((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))[+op]((projh ` c0)∘(projh `(_|_ ` c1)))), ((projh `(c0 ⋂ c1))[+op](projh `(c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1)))), ((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))=((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)))
  oveq12d(((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1)), chos, ((projh ` c0)∘(projh `(_|_ ` c1))), (projh `(c0 ⋂ c1)), (projh `(c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1))), ((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))=((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)))
  pjclem4(c0, c1)
  syl(((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))=((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)), ((projh ` c0)∘(projh `(_|_ ` c1)))=(projh `(c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1))), ((projh ` c0)∘(projh `(_|_ ` c1)))=((projh `(_|_ ` c1))∘(projh ` c0)))
  pjclem3(c0, c1)
  pjclem4(c0, (_|_ ` c1))
  eqtr3i((projh ` c0), (((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))[+op]((projh ` c0)∘(projh `(_|_ ` c1)))), ((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` ~H)))
  eqtr3i(((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` ~H)), (projh ` c0), ((projh ` c0)∘ Iop))
  coeq2i((projh ` c0), chio, (projh ` ~H))
  df-iop()
  hoid1i((projh ` c0))
  pjfi(c0)
  eqtr3i(((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` ~H)), (((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))[+op]((projh ` c0)∘(projh `(_|_ ` c1)))), ((projh ` c0)∘((projh ` c1)[+op](projh `(_|_ ` c1)))))
  coeq2i((projh ` c0), ((projh ` c1)[+op](projh `(_|_ ` c1))), (projh ` ~H))
  pjtoi(c1)
  pjsdii(c0, (projh ` c1), (projh `(_|_ ` c1)))
  pjfi(c1)
  pjfi((_|_ ` c1))
  ax-mp((projh `((c0 ⋂ c1)[vH](c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1))))=((projh `(c0 ⋂ c1))[+op](projh `(c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1)))), (c0 ⋂ c1)⊆(_|_ `(c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1))))
  sseqtr4i((c0 ⋂ c1), (_|_ `(c0 ⋂(_|_ ` c1))), ((_|_ ` c0)[vH]c1))
  sstri((c0 ⋂ c1), ((_|_ ` c0)[vH]c1), c1)

  chub2i(c1, (_|_ ` c0))
  choccli(c0)
  chdmm3i(c0, c1)

blocks.name: pjcmul1i
blocks.content: A necessary and sufficient condition for the product of two projectors to be a projector is that the projectors commute. Part 1 of Theorem 1 of [AkhiezerGlazman] p. 65. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pjcmul1i(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wceq(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c0))), wcel(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), crn(cpjh)))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
} = {
  impbii(wceq(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c0))), wcel(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), crn(cpjh)))
  syl6eqel(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), crn(cpjh), cfv(cpjh, cin(c0, c1)), wceq(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c0))))
  pjclem4(c0, c1)
  mp2an(wcel(cfv(cpjh, cin(c0, c1)), crn(cpjh)), wfn(cpjh, cch), wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch))
  pjmfn()
  chincli(c0, c1)
  fnfvelrn(cpjh, cch, cin(c0, c1))
  syl5reqr(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c0)), cfv(cado, ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1))), wcel(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), crn(cpjh)))
  eqtri(cfv(cado, ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1))), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c0)), ccom(cfv(cado, cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cado, cfv(cpjh, c0))))
  adjcoi(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1))
  pjbdlni(c0)
  pjbdlni(c1)
  coeq12i(cfv(cado, cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cado, cfv(cpjh, c0)), cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c0))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cado, cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c1)), wcel(c1, cch))
  pjadj3(c1)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cado, cfv(cpjh, c0)), cfv(cpjh, c0)), wcel(c0, cch))
  pjadj3(c0)
  pjadj2(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)))
}

thm pjcmul1i(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))=((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))↔((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∈ ran(projh))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
} = {
  impbii(((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))=((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)), ((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∈ ran(projh))
  syl6eqel(((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1)), ran(projh), (projh `(c0 ⋂ c1)), ((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))=((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)))
  pjclem4(c0, c1)
  mp2an((projh `(c0 ⋂ c1))∈ ran(projh), projh[Fn]CH, (c0 ⋂ c1)∈ CH)
  pjmfn()
  chincli(c0, c1)
  fnfvelrn(cpjh, cch, (c0 ⋂ c1))
  syl5reqr(((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1)), ((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)), (adjh `((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))), ((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∈ ran(projh))
  eqtri((adjh `((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))), ((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)), ((adjh `(projh ` c1))∘(adjh `(projh ` c0))))
  adjcoi((projh ` c0), (projh ` c1))
  pjbdlni(c0)
  pjbdlni(c1)
  coeq12i((adjh `(projh ` c1)), (adjh `(projh ` c0)), (projh ` c1), (projh ` c0))
  ax-mp((adjh `(projh ` c1))=(projh ` c1), c1 ∈ CH)
  pjadj3(c1)
  ax-mp((adjh `(projh ` c0))=(projh ` c0), c0 ∈ CH)
  pjadj3(c0)
  pjadj2(((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1)))
}

  mp2an(wcel(cfv(cpjh, cin(c0, c1)), crn(cpjh)), wfn(cpjh, cch), wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch))

blocks.pretty:
thm pjcmul2i(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))=((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))↔((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))=(projh `(c0 ⋂ c1)))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH

  pjclem4(c0, c1)
  sylibr(((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))=(projh `(c0 ⋂ c1)), ((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))=((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0)), ((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∈ ran(projh))

  mp2an((projh `(c0 ⋂ c1))∈ ran(projh), projh[Fn]CH, (c0 ⋂ c1)∈ CH)
  pjmfn()

  fnfvelrn(cpjh, cch, (c0 ⋂ c1))

blocks.name: pjadj2coi
blocks.content: Adjoint of double composition of projections. Generalization of special case of Theorem 3.11(viii) of [Beran] p. 106. (Contributed by NM, 1-Dec-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pjadj2coi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(co(cfv(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), cfv(cpjh, c4)), c0), csp, c1), co(c0, csp, cfv(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c4), cfv(cpjh, c3)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c1))))
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| wcel(c3, cch)
  -| wcel(c4, cch)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(cfv(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), cfv(cpjh, c4)), c0), csp, c1), co(c0, csp, cfv(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c4), cfv(cpjh, c3)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c1)), co(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c4), c0)), csp, c1), co(c0, csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c4), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c1))), wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)))
  eqtrd(co(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c4), c0)), csp, c1), co(c0, csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c4), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c1))), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c4), c0), csp, cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(co(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c4), c0)), csp, c1), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c4), c0), csp, cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c1))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c4), c0), chba))
  pjhcli(c0, c4)
  pjadjcoi(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c4), c0), c1, c2, c3)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c4), c0), csp, cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c1)), co(c0, csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c4), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c1)))), wcel(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c1), chba))
  pjcohcli(c1, c3, c2)
  pjadji(c0, cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c1), c4)
  adantr(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(co(cfv(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), cfv(cpjh, c4)), c0), csp, c1), co(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c4), c0)), csp, c1)))
  oveq1d(cfv(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), cfv(cpjh, c4)), c0), csp, c1, cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c4), c0)), wcel(c0, chba))
  hocoi(c0, ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), cfv(cpjh, c4))
  hocofi(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3))
  adantl(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(co(c0, csp, cfv(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c4), cfv(cpjh, c3)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c1)), co(c0, csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c4), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c1)))))
  oveq2d(c0, csp, cfv(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c4), cfv(cpjh, c3)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c4), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c1)), wcel(c1, chba))
  syl5eq(cfv(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c4), cfv(cpjh, c3)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c4), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c1)), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c4), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), cfv(cpjh, c2))), c1), wcel(c1, chba))
  fveq1i(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c4), cfv(cpjh, c3)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c1, ccom(cfv(cpjh, c4), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), cfv(cpjh, c2))))
  coass(cfv(cpjh, c4), cfv(cpjh, c3), cfv(cpjh, c2))
  hocoi(c1, cfv(cpjh, c4), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c3), cfv(cpjh, c2)))
  pjfi(c4)
  hocofi(cfv(cpjh, c3), cfv(cpjh, c2))
  pjfi(c3)
  pjfi(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pjadj2coi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ~H ∧ c1 ∈ ~H)→(((((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))∘(projh ` c4))` c0)[.ih]c1)=(c0[.ih]((((projh ` c4)∘(projh ` c3))∘(projh ` c2))` c1)))
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c3 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c4 ∈ CH
} = {
  3eqtr4d((((((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))∘(projh ` c4))` c0)[.ih]c1), (c0[.ih]((((projh ` c4)∘(projh ` c3))∘(projh ` c2))` c1)), ((((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))`((projh ` c4)` c0))[.ih]c1), (c0[.ih]((projh ` c4)`(((projh ` c3)∘(projh ` c2))` c1))), (c0 ∈ ~H ∧ c1 ∈ ~H))
  eqtrd(((((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))`((projh ` c4)` c0))[.ih]c1), (c0[.ih]((projh ` c4)`(((projh ` c3)∘(projh ` c2))` c1))), (((projh ` c4)` c0)[.ih](((projh ` c3)∘(projh ` c2))` c1)), (c0 ∈ ~H ∧ c1 ∈ ~H))
  sylan(c0 ∈ ~H, c1 ∈ ~H, ((((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))`((projh ` c4)` c0))[.ih]c1)=(((projh ` c4)` c0)[.ih](((projh ` c3)∘(projh ` c2))` c1)), ((projh ` c4)` c0)∈ ~H)
  pjhcli(c0, c4)
  pjadjcoi(((projh ` c4)` c0), c1, c2, c3)
  sylan2(c0 ∈ ~H, c1 ∈ ~H, (((projh ` c4)` c0)[.ih](((projh ` c3)∘(projh ` c2))` c1))=(c0[.ih]((projh ` c4)`(((projh ` c3)∘(projh ` c2))` c1))), (((projh ` c3)∘(projh ` c2))` c1)∈ ~H)
  pjcohcli(c1, c3, c2)
  pjadji(c0, (((projh ` c3)∘(projh ` c2))` c1), c4)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ~H, c1 ∈ ~H, (((((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))∘(projh ` c4))` c0)[.ih]c1)=((((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))`((projh ` c4)` c0))[.ih]c1))
  oveq1d(((((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))∘(projh ` c4))` c0), csp, c1, (((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))`((projh ` c4)` c0)), c0 ∈ ~H)
  hocoi(c0, ((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3)), (projh ` c4))
  hocofi((projh ` c2), (projh ` c3))
  adantl(c0 ∈ ~H, c1 ∈ ~H, (c0[.ih]((((projh ` c4)∘(projh ` c3))∘(projh ` c2))` c1))=(c0[.ih]((projh ` c4)`(((projh ` c3)∘(projh ` c2))` c1))))
  oveq2d(c0, csp, ((((projh ` c4)∘(projh ` c3))∘(projh ` c2))` c1), ((projh ` c4)`(((projh ` c3)∘(projh ` c2))` c1)), c1 ∈ ~H)
  syl5eq(((((projh ` c4)∘(projh ` c3))∘(projh ` c2))` c1), ((projh ` c4)`(((projh ` c3)∘(projh ` c2))` c1)), (((projh ` c4)∘((projh ` c3)∘(projh ` c2)))` c1), c1 ∈ ~H)
  fveq1i((((projh ` c4)∘(projh ` c3))∘(projh ` c2)), c1, ((projh ` c4)∘((projh ` c3)∘(projh ` c2))))
  coass((projh ` c4), (projh ` c3), (projh ` c2))
  hocoi(c1, (projh ` c4), ((projh ` c3)∘(projh ` c2)))
  pjfi(c4)
  hocofi((projh ` c3), (projh ` c2))
  pjfi(c3)
  pjfi(c2)
}

blocks.name: pj2cocli
blocks.content: Closure of double composition of projections. (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pj2cocli(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c2)), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0), c1))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| wcel(c3, cch)
} = {
  eqeltrd(cfv(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c2)), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0), c1, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c3), c0))), wcel(c0, chba))
  ho2coi(c0, cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3))
  pjfi(c1)
  pjfi(c2)
  pjfi(c3)
  3syl(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c3), c0))), c1), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c3), c0), chba), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c3), c0)), chba))
  pjhcli(c0, c3)
  pjhcli(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c3), c0), c2)
  pjcli(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c3), c0)), c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pj2cocli(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ~H →((((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c2))∘(projh ` c3))` c0)∈ c1)
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c3 ∈ CH
} = {
  eqeltrd(((((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c2))∘(projh ` c3))` c0), c1, ((projh ` c1)`((projh ` c2)`((projh ` c3)` c0))), c0 ∈ ~H)
  ho2coi(c0, (projh ` c1), (projh ` c2), (projh ` c3))
  pjfi(c1)
  pjfi(c2)
  pjfi(c3)
  3syl(c0 ∈ ~H, ((projh ` c1)`((projh ` c2)`((projh ` c3)` c0)))∈ c1, ((projh ` c3)` c0)∈ ~H, ((projh ` c2)`((projh ` c3)` c0))∈ ~H)
  pjhcli(c0, c3)
  pjhcli(((projh ` c3)` c0), c2)
  pjcli(((projh ` c2)`((projh ` c3)` c0)), c1)
}

blocks.name: pj3lem1
blocks.content: Lemma for projection triplet theorem. (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pj3lem1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cin(cin(c1, c2), c3)), wceq(cfv(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c2)), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0), c0))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| wcel(c3, cch)
} = {
  syl5eq(cfv(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c2)), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0), c0, cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3))), c0), wcel(c0, cin(cin(c1, c2), c3)))
  fveq1i(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c2)), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0, ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3))))
  coass(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3))
  eleq2s(c0, cin(cin(c1, c2), c3), cin(c1, cin(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3))), c0), c0))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cin(c1, cin(c2, c3))), wceq(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3))), c0), c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cin(c2, c3))))
  elin(c0, c1, cin(c2, c3))
  eqtrd(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3))), c0), c0, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cin(c2, c3))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cin(c2, c3))), wceq(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3))), c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0))), wcel(c0, chba))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cin(c2, c3)), wcel(c0, chba))
  cheli(c0, c1)
  hocoi(c0, cfv(cpjh, c1), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)))
  pjfi(c1)
  hocofi(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3))
  pjfi(c2)
  pjfi(c3)
  impcom(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cin(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0)), c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cin(c2, c3)), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0)), c0)), wceq(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0), c0))
  pjclem4a(c0, c2, c3)
  sylibd(wceq(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0), c0), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0)), c0), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0)), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0)))
  syl6bir(wceq(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0), c0), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0)), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0)), wcel(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0), c1))
  eleq1(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0), c0, c1)
  mpan(wcel(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0), c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0)), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0)), wcel(c1, cch))
  pjid(c1, cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0))
  eqeq2(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0), c0, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c3)), c0)))
  inass(c1, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pj3lem1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈((c1 ⋂ c2)⋂ c3)→((((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c2))∘(projh ` c3))` c0)= c0)
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c3 ∈ CH
} = {
  syl5eq(((((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c2))∘(projh ` c3))` c0), c0, (((projh ` c1)∘((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3)))` c0), c0 ∈((c1 ⋂ c2)⋂ c3))
  fveq1i((((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c2))∘(projh ` c3)), c0, ((projh ` c1)∘((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))))
  coass((projh ` c1), (projh ` c2), (projh ` c3))
  eleq2s(c0, ((c1 ⋂ c2)⋂ c3), (c1 ⋂(c2 ⋂ c3)), (((projh ` c1)∘((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3)))` c0)= c0)
  sylbi(c0 ∈(c1 ⋂(c2 ⋂ c3)), (((projh ` c1)∘((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3)))` c0)= c0, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈(c2 ⋂ c3)))
  elin(c0, c1, (c2 ⋂ c3))
  eqtrd((((projh ` c1)∘((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3)))` c0), c0, ((projh ` c1)`(((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0)), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈(c2 ⋂ c3)))
  syl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈(c2 ⋂ c3)), (((projh ` c1)∘((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3)))` c0)=((projh ` c1)`(((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0)), c0 ∈ ~H)
  adantr(c0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈(c2 ⋂ c3), c0 ∈ ~H)
  cheli(c0, c1)
  hocoi(c0, (projh ` c1), ((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3)))
  pjfi(c1)
  hocofi((projh ` c2), (projh ` c3))
  pjfi(c2)
  pjfi(c3)
  impcom(c0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈(c2 ⋂ c3), ((projh ` c1)`(((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0))= c0)
  syl(c0 ∈(c2 ⋂ c3), (c0 ∈ c1 →((projh ` c1)`(((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0))= c0), (((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0)= c0)
  pjclem4a(c0, c2, c3)
  sylibd((((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0)= c0, c0 ∈ c1, ((projh ` c1)`(((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0))= c0, ((projh ` c1)`(((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0))=(((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0))
  syl6bir((((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0)= c0, c0 ∈ c1, ((projh ` c1)`(((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0))=(((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0), (((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0)∈ c1)
  eleq1((((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0), c0, c1)
  mpan((((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0)∈ c1, ((projh ` c1)`(((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0))=(((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0), c1 ∈ CH)
  pjid(c1, (((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0))
  eqeq2((((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0), c0, ((projh ` c1)`(((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c3))` c0)))
  inass(c1, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: pj3si
blocks.content: Stronger projection triplet theorem. (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pj3si(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wceq(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c0))), wss(crn(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c2))), c1)), wceq(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), cfv(cpjh, cin(cin(c0, c1), c2))))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)

thm pj3i(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wceq(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c0))), wceq(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c0)), cfv(cpjh, c2)))), wceq(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), cfv(cpjh, cin(cin(c0, c1), c2))))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
} = {
  sylan2(wceq(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c2), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c0))), wceq(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c0)), cfv(cpjh, c2))), wceq(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), cfv(cpjh, cin(cin(c0, c1), c2))), wss(crn(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c2))), c1))
  syl6eqss(crn(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c2))), c1, crn(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c2)))), wceq(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c0)), cfv(cpjh, c2))))
  rneqd(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c2))), wceq(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c0)), cfv(cpjh, c2))))
  mpbiri(wceq(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c0)), cfv(cpjh, c2))), wceq(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c2)))), wceq(ccom(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c0)), cfv(cpjh, c2)), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c2)))))
  coass(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c2))

thm pj3i(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (((((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∘(projh ` c2))=(((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c1))∘(projh ` c0))∧(((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∘(projh ` c2))=(((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))∘(projh ` c2)))→(((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∘(projh ` c2))=(projh `((c0 ⋂ c1)⋂ c2)))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
} = {
  sylan2((((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∘(projh ` c2))=(((projh ` c2)∘(projh ` c1))∘(projh ` c0)), (((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∘(projh ` c2))=(((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))∘(projh ` c2)), (((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∘(projh ` c2))=(projh `((c0 ⋂ c1)⋂ c2)), ran((((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∘(projh ` c2)))⊆ c1)
  syl6eqss(ran((((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∘(projh ` c2))), c1, ran(((projh ` c1)∘((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c2)))), (((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∘(projh ` c2))=(((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))∘(projh ` c2)))
  rneqd((((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∘(projh ` c2)), ((projh ` c1)∘((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c2))), (((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∘(projh ` c2))=(((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))∘(projh ` c2)))
  mpbiri((((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∘(projh ` c2))=(((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))∘(projh ` c2)), (((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∘(projh ` c2))=((projh ` c1)∘((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c2))), (((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))∘(projh ` c2))=((projh ` c1)∘((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c2))))
  coass((projh ` c1), (projh ` c0), (projh ` c2))
  eqeq1((((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))∘(projh ` c2)), (((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c0))∘(projh ` c2)), ((projh ` c1)∘((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c2))))
  sseqtri(ran(((projh ` c1)∘((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c2)))), c1, ran((projh ` c1)))
  rncoss((projh ` c1), ((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c2)))
  pjrni(c1)
  pj3si(c0, c1, c2)
}
